org.drombler.commons.fx.scene.renderer

Interface DataRenderer<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type of the data to render
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractDataRenderer, DayOfWeekRenderer, FormatterDataRenderer, LocalDateDayOfMonthRenderer, LocalizerRenderer, MonthRenderer, ObjectRenderer, WholeNumberRenderer, YearRenderer

    public interface DataRenderer<T>
    Note: more methods might be added
    Author:
    puce

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Node getGraphic(T item)
      Gets a graphical representation of the item.
      List<String> getStyleClass()
      Gets all possible style classes for any item.
      List<String> getStyleClass(T item)
      Gets a list of style classes for the specified item.
      String getText(T item)
      Gets a text representation of the item.

        Gets a text representation of the item.

      • getStyleClass

        List<String> getStyleClass(T item)
        Gets a list of style classes for the specified item.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        a list of style classes for the specified item

      • getStyleClass

        List<String> getStyleClass()
        Gets all possible style classes for any item. E.g. if getStyleClass(a) returns ["foo"] and getStyleClass(b) returns ["bar"], then this method should return ["foo", "bar"].
        Returns:
        all possible style classes for any item
